alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 04 at 6:03AM MST until March 04 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook County. In South Dakota, Butte County, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, the Southern Meade County Plains and the Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Black ice may exist on area roadways, resulting in icy road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
